patterns: \bwhich\ AI\ API\ is\ the\ best\ for\ reasoning\b
responses:
The "best" AI API for reasoning
depends on your specific use case.

Top choices often include:
OpenAI (GPT-4, GPT-4o)
Anthropic (Claude 3 Opus, Sonnet)
Google (Gemini 1.5 Pro)
Mistral AI (Mistral Large)

Consider cost, context window size,
and benchmark performance for your tasks.

identifier. It authenticates
a user, developer, or program
to an API. It grants access
to specific services and
tracks usage.
